message.data: 由于SAFE主网升级中网络有波动，目前暂停所有交易所SAFE充提，Bitpie钱包已于6月25日14：00（UTC+8）暂停SAFE收发币功能，具体恢复时间另行通知，请您耐心等待。

如您有任何疑问，请随时咨询bitpie官方：
官方客服微信号：tingtingwuxu
官方微博：比特派钱包

en.title: Announcement on Suspension of SAFE Sending and Receiving

message.data: Due to the SAFE network upgrade, for the sake of your asset safety, Bitpie has already suspended the sending and receiving of SAFE at the time of 14:00, June 25, 2019(UTC+8). We will resume SAFE sending and receiving immediately after the network runs stably.

If you have any question, feel free to reach out on:
Telegram: https://t.me/BitpieInternational
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BitpieWallet
